resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75789</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75789</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a4e20f04-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az Emberi és Polgári Jogok Nyilatkozata</string>
            <string language="en">The Declaration of Human and Civil Rights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Erklärung der menschlichen und Zivilrechte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La déclaration des droits humains et civiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A declaração de direitas humanas e civis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La dichiarazione dei diritti umani e civili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Διακήρυξη των ανθρώπινων και αστικών δικαιωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El declaración de las derechas humanas y civiles</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az Emberi és Polgári Jogok Nyilatkozata 1789. augusztus 26. A mózesi kőtáblákat és a római köztársaságot (vesszőnyaláb) egyaránt idézi az ábrázolás.</string>
            <string language="en">The Declaration of Human and Civil Rights 26. August 1789. The representation evokes both Mozes's stone tables and the Republic of Rome (bunch of sticks)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">francia forradalom,  politikai szabadságjogok,  felvilágosodás,  </string>
            <string language="en">French Revolution, political franchise, enlightenment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Erklärung menschlicher und Zivilrechte 26. 
August 1789. Die Darstellung erwähnt Mozess Steintabellen
und die Republik von Rom (Bündel Stöcke)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La déclaration des droits humains et civiques 26. 
Août 1789. La représentation évoque les tables en 
pierre et la République de Mozes de Rome (groupe de bâtons)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A declaração das direitas humanas e civis 26. 
Agosto 1789. A respresentação evokes  as tabelas de 
pedra e a república de Mozes de Roma (grupo das varas)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La dichiarazione dei diritti umani e civili 26. 
Agosto del 1789. La rappresentazione evoca sia le tabelle 
di pietra che la Repubblica del Mozes di Roma (mazzo di bastoni)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Διακήρυξη των ανθρώπινων και αστικών δικαιωμάτων 
26, Αύγουστος 1789. Η αντιπροσώπευση προκαλεί και τους 
πίνακες πετρών Mozes και τη Δημοκρατία της Ρώμης (δέσμη των 
ραβδιών)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El declaración de las derechas humanas y civiles 
26. Agosto de 1789. La representación evoca los vectores 
de piedra y la república de Mozes de Roma (manojo de palillos)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französische Revolution, politisches Vorrecht, 
Aufklärung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Révolution française, concession politique, 
éclaircissement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Volta francesa, franchise político, enlightenment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro francese, concessione politica, chiarimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλική επανάσταση, πολιτικό προνόμιο, Διαφωτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revolución francesa, licencia política, aclaración</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75789</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=a4e20f04-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
